title: PR Enhancement Schema
description: Structured format for enhanced Pull Request descriptions

summary.description: One-paragraph overview of the PR's primary purpose

changes.description: List of specific changes made in this PR

testing.description: Testing status based on visible test file changes

conventional_commits.description: Number of commits following conventional format

suggestions.description: Suggestions for improving commit messages (if any)
